item.title: Chuck Berry - Run Run Rudolph - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Run Run Rudolph by Chuck Berry from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.title: Chuck Berry - Rock 'n' Roll Music - Key of D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Rock 'n' Roll Music by Chuck Berry from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A7, Bm, D, D7, G.
